about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate software engineer and consultant from Kerkrade, Netherlands, who started my professional journey at just 18 years old. What drives me is the intersection of technology and real-world impact - whether that's building smart city solutions for governments or diving into the immersive world of virtual reality.
about.description2: When I'm not coding, you'll find me lost in music, planning my next adventure to eat desserts around the world, or dancing at funk parties. I'm always excited to collaborate on projects that blend technology with creativity and make a real difference in people's lives.

cityNeverSleeps.title: The City That Never Sleeps
cityNeverSleeps.description:
For my graduation project, I decided to travel to São Paulo, one of the world's largest metropolises and Brazil's economic center. It offers a blend of culture, food, vibrant nightlife, and of course, amazing weather.

I stayed in São Paulo for 5 months and during my stay, I fell in love with the city and the people. I made so many friends and had so many amazing experiences. I loved using Uber to get around the city and ordering food from Ifood, as well as visiting so many cool restaurants and bars. No matter what time of day it is, there's always something to do. truly a city that never sleeps.

In the image carousel, you can see some of my favourite places in São Paulo. I really recommend visiting them if you ever get the chance.

inteliProject.title: Project at Inteli
inteliProject.description:
I successfully completed my graduation project at Inteli, an IT and business university in São Paulo, Brazil. A non-profit tech-focused college that offers project-based undergraduate programs in computer engineering, software engineering, computer science, and information systems. Its campus is located in the Butantã neighborhood, within University City, and is recognized for its hands-on methodology, direct connection to companies, and mission to train leaders who will transform Brazil through technology.

I created a system that allows the employees working at the project management office to manage the projects and the partners. The system is a web application with a backend in Node.js and a frontend in React.

unityControl.title: CGI UnityControl
unityControl.description: An innovative solution for a safer and more manageable environment. CGI UnityControl connects all dynamic objects in the outdoor space and provides integrated control over these objects.
features: Improved safety and mobility in outdoor spaces
Management of the entire outdoor space in one geographic interface
Extensive display options, from control room to mobile
Control is transferable for collaboration during events
Exact insight into energy consumption with integration to financial systems
unityControl.challenge: Integration of different management systems and vendor-independent implementation
unityControl.impact: Savings in time and money through more efficient maintenance and management, with significant energy savings on street lighting

aiChatbot.title: AI Chatbot Solutions
aiChatbot.description: Intelligent chatbot solutions developed for various clients across different industries, designed to help with complex issues, minimize manual labor, enhance security, reduce manual errors, and save time through automated problem-solving.
features: Reduction of manual errors in critical processes
aiChatbot.challenge: Adapting AI models to different client domains and ensuring consistent performance across various use cases
aiChatbot.impact: Reduced manual labor, enhanced security monitoring, and minimized manual errors while saving significant time on complex issue resolution

smartStore.title: Smart Store Sensor System
smartStore.description: An intelligent sensor-based solution for retail stores that monitors temperature, power consumption, and environmental factors to optimize energy usage and reduce carbon emissions.
features: Carbon emission reduction through smart automation
smartStore.challenge: Integrating multiple sensor types and ensuring reliable data collection across different store environments
smartStore.impact: Reduction in carbon emissions and energy costs while maintaining optimal store conditions

hero.title: Hobby Projects
hero.subtitle: Personal projects where creativity meets technology

breadWaste.title: Bread Waste Tracker
breadWaste.description: Working in a supermarket, I noticed that too much bread was being thrown away and employees had to manually count everything, creating no reliable dataset. I wanted to digitalize the way the bread serving was noted by creating a web app using C# backend with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frontend to track and reduce food waste. This was one of the first web development projects I did that made me fall in love with programming.

terrariaModding.title: Terraria Modding
terrariaModding.description: I created lots of fun mods for Terraria, but my best work was the Copper Shortsword mod. This mod added various new content including new enemies, biomes, weapons, armor, and even a boss - all based around the copper shortsword, the very first weapon you use in the game. It was a comprehensive expansion that breathed new life into the starting weapon.

stylemate.title: StyleMate
stylemate.description: A mobile shopping app that revolutionizes how people discover clothing. Like Tinder for fashion, users swipe through clothing pieces they like, and if they want to buy an item, they get redirected to the product page. Built with a React frontend and C# backend, StyleMate makes shopping more engaging and personalized.
